body: so in the end akiko not married with komatsuzawa huh?
for a change, the husband actually divorced the wife instead of either keeping it going with her cheating on him, or the story left open. to many series just don't do the poor guys justice.
Dudes, again this is CHEATING, not fuckng NTR, chill out xD
@Sparky_ I totally agree man.

Hate how the girl always gets a good ending, even after all that.  Pure disgust.  At least the husband got something out of it, but it ruined the story that he asked her to go out together at the end, what a cuck (as usual per NTR stories).
@madarareveluv probably some sex friend, maybe it's the old chad guy.

@madarareveluv - I figure she's talking to the third guy.  She was in awe of his dick and he liked her snatch too.  Of course he's married and wife tolerates his cheating.  So she might be his mistress now. Or just sex friend. If you think about it her tears make sense too.  She wanted to be a wife and a mother.  Instead her family, friends, and herself knows she ruined her marriage.  So she's lost everything and become a "fallen" woman instead.  She's lost everything she actually wanted.
What an amazing story freaking loved it 10/10 best NTR story and such a shame it's so rare to find
I wonder who she was talking to on the phone before she deleted the mc's contact.
It's a shame that the wife is well off after the divorce, it would be more cathartic if she got really fucked up financially or emotionally but I guess this is the most realistic route.

@winterknightx - I'll try. After getting busted and confessing.  They divorce.  She moves out and gets a job where she worked before.  She even decodes to pay compensation to her ex for ruining the marriage.  Yeah, hubby lied but she actually committed adultery.  They meet up for her to give him the last compensation payment.  He wants to go out with her but she shoots him down.  Next it seems like she's on the phone with someone maybe?  She's probably still fucking old guy as a mistress now.  Then the end is where she deletes exes contact info from phone and sheds some tears.  Maybe she still loves him or hates herself.  Who knows.

@winterknightX. Guy tells cheating wife that he was infertile and couldn't have kids so he stopped having sex with her so she wouldnt' find out. After that, they divorced and she moved out. They met so she could pay off the alimony from her cheating & they separate. She deletes the ex-husbands contact afterwards & the 2 don't meet again. 

Pretty amicable split given the circumstances.
bitch.....mm
I'm not reading the whole thing as NTR sucks ass but at least the ending was good I suppose. These things can happen to everybody after all.

There isn't any noticeable difference in this version that I could spot on. As I said before in the previous version's comment section, reading this series was amazing: I love the art, I love the story, it did hit my feels (again!). An absolute masterpiece.
